Its the holiday season, and rather than run a show on Christmas Eve Eve next week, WWE taped the Dec. 23 episode of SmackDown right after the one that aired last night (Dec. 16).
Heres what went dow… [+1717 chars]

articles.title: Watch: METALLICA Performs 'Lux Æterna' Live For First Time - BLABBERMOUTH.NET
articles.description: METALLICA performed its new single "Lux Æterna" live for the first time last night (Friday, December 16) at its "Helping Hands Concert & Auction", which took place at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. The third edition of the "Helping Hands Concert &a…
